summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the east 216 feet and the west 60 feet of the north 80 feet of the east 276 feet of Tract 14, Ravenna Springs Park Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-244 and 17-190, respectively.
